data.description:
Refresh your mind, body, and spirit with 200+ Tai Chi inspired workouts across 20 beautiful nature settings!

Experience a modern reimagining of an ancient practice.

–RECHARGE IN BEAUTIFUL NATURE ENVIRONMENTS–
Discover the wilds of nature, in the comfort of your own home, with 3-minute to 60-minute sessions.

–FIND YOUR FLOW–
Let go of tension and stress across 100 meditative sessions in FLOW MODE. A perfect gateway to the concepts of Tai Chi for beginners. Find yourself in the flow, refreshed, and energized.

–COMPETE ACROSS THE GLOBE–
Win points for perfect form across 100 sessions in ARCADE MODE. Or challenge yourself with the randomized WORLD TOUR MODE, a 15, 30, or 60-minute Tai Chi endurance marathon. Strengthen and tone your body, while relaxing your mind.

–CUSTOMIZE YOUR WORKOUT–
Make your practice perfect for you through highly adjustable settings. Optional foot, teacher, audio, and vibration refinement to fit your unique needs

Find your happy place.®

changelog.change_log:
Guided Tai Chi v1.2.40 brings some lovely quality of life enhancements.

HAND TRACKING 2.0
When hand tracking v1 was announced we jumped up and down to support it at launch. With hand tracking v2, we're excited to have even higher quality hand tracking for your Tai Chi experience.

CLEARER VISUALS 
Quest 1 and Quest 2 are surprisingly different hardware. One update we've made is to increase the visual fidelity for Quest 2 users, by removing fixed foveated rendering. This will remove any peripheral blurriness and increase immersion.

UI REFINEMENTS
We've refined how the UI cursor appears and displays throughout menu systems. This small change feels really nice.

IMPROVED CONTROLLER SWAPPING SUPPORT
The old version had a few odd behaviors when switching dominant hand or switching from controllers to hands. We've fixed these. You can now swap back and forth, from primary hand or control method without any quirks.

TEACHERS FACE FORWARD OPTION
Due to a few conflicting options, Teachers Face Forward would sometimes not work as intended which was frustrating. The Teachers Face Forward option will now always work correctly in gameplay.

---

FUTURE ENHANCEMENTS
While we've been silent for a bit, we have some fun (100% free) updates coming in 2022. We hope you enjoy! :)

---

FIND A BUG? HAVE AN IDEA? NEED A FRIEND?
Send messages in a bottle our way at gtc@cubicleninjas.com. We'd love to hear from you!

– Summer 2020 Update for Guide Tai Chi –

• 10 new environments!
• Improvements to World Tour mode: 15 minute version, bug fixes.
• Updates to guardian detection and foot display.
• Added feature to constrain pathing for smaller guardian spaces.
• Options additions based on feedback: inverse vibration, turn off vibration, toggle teachers, volume sliders to raise or mute content.

v1.01 Changes
• Leaderboard caching and display bug fix.
• Various enhancements based on feedback.

v1.02 Changes
• Foundational updates to set the stage for hand-tracking.
• Updates to the dynamic environment lighting system to better showcase time of day changes.
